name: The Michael Game
description:
Plans

  • Create custom level tab and level editor
  • Add music and background assets
  • Animate Flippy

Lore

Flippy the Frog (any pronouns) has been trapped by his evil cousin, Michael (pronouns he/him,) in a tank where physics bend to Michael's rules! Michael isn't completely evil, though. He gave Flippy some blocks to play with. Flippy has figured out how to use the blocks to its advantage, however. Can you help Flippy teleport out of their tank to freedom?

Controls

Left and Right Arrow Keys or A and D to move left and right

Space to jump

Left/Right Click or Z/X to place or pick up a block.

When the crosshairs are hovering over air, you can place a block

When the crosshairs are hovering over a block, you can pick that block up.

Types of Blocks

Breakable

This is the only block you can place and pick up. Use it to your advantage.

Breakable-5

When you pick this one up, it gives you five blocks instead of one.

Unbreakable

You can't break this one. Don't even try.

Tainted Air

You can't place blocks in this type of air.

Goal

This is how you get out of the tank.

Checkpoint

Walk over this to keep from losing progress when dying.
